name: symbol-web
description: web site of symbol by community
author: yuichiro - frinker <47295014+ymuichiro@users.noreply.github.com>

scripts.install: yarn --cwd backend install && yarn --cwd frontend install
scripts.dev: yarn --cwd backend run develop & yarn --cwd frontend run dev
scripts.build: yarn --cwd backend run build && yarn --cwd frontend run build
scripts.start: yarn --cwd backend run start & yarn --cwd frontend run start
